descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a small chest located at the Riverwood blacksmith contained within it are a number of enchanted rings and amulets that once equipped will summon various creatures ranging from the simple red fox to the mighty dragon. 

For each included creature a ring and amulet are provided that will call that creature forth to fight for you. The creature will remain summoned until the ring or amulet is unequipped only one creature can be summoned at any time. 

The creatures make use of mostly unaltered vanilla stats and will scale with the players level

This is my first mod release any constructive feedback or criticism is more than welcomed. 

Known Issues 

None known if you encounter any issues such as crashes please post about it in the comments section. 

If not summoned during combat the dragon will remain on the ground and will attempt to follow you however may have a difficult time navigating through trees and other obstacles. 

Special thanks to Bethesda for developing an amazing game and for their continued support of the PC mod community.
